lines: ${loverName} would like to participate in a fishing tournament. Would you like to go along with him?
He really wants to go, so if you don't go, he'll either find someone else to go, or go by himself. Will you change your mind and go with him?
${loverName} says, "Maybe we can get together some other time."
When he picks you up, you notice that he looks quite dashing and rugged in his flannel shirt and denim coveralls.
There is another woman (a widow) on the boat, acting very helpless. She asks your date if he can help her "wind this thingamajig." How do you feel?

At your age, less bothers you than when you were younger. You are sure he is not going to run off with anyone. After the fishing trip, he thanks you for coming along and brings his face close to yours. You can:
#WAIT FOR HIM TO MAKE THE FIRST MOVE, THEN KISS HIM PASSIONATELY

The gentle romantic kiss sends the two of you into a soft loving embrace. His whiskers and rough skin tickle. You have been a great companion today, and ${loverName} shows his appreciation by offering you a night out on the town next weekend.
(Make sure your teeth are in tightly.) You return his kiss passionately, which seems to take him by surprise. He doesn't seem to resist.
You rest a bit to catch your breath. ${loverName} looks uncomfortable. He explains that He is not ready to just dive into a whirlwind romance with you or anyone else. He wishes you a good night.
${loverName} looks uncomfortable. He is flattered but explains that he isn't ready to dive right into a whirlwind romance right now. He wishes you good night.
If you wanted this kind of aggravation, you could have stayed at home with your husband!
${loverName} comments that you seem a bit formal, and sneaks you a peck on the cheek, anyway.

You get that jealous look in your eye and ${loverName} senses it. That doesn't stop him from helping that widow, mind you, but he senses your jealousy and is flattered by it. It makes him feel good to know that he is worth fighting for.
Unfortunately, you don't have the social skills necessary to keep ${loverName}'s attention. He spends most of the afternoon helping the widow.

Since your social skills are very strong, you can chat with other people and have a good time for the short time that ${loverName} helps the flirtatious widow. After the trip, he takes you back home. Will you?

${loverName} thinks you are being a bit unreasonable. After all, she's not asking him to jump off the boat and swim away with her to some secluded hideaway. Your possessiveness reminds him of an ex-wife and puts a damper on the evening.
